app_descript:
App Name: The STIGMA App

Package Name: app.thestigma.mobile

Brief: The STIGMA App provides a heartening platform where individuals can share, connect, and support each other through their unique mental health journeys. It emphasizes the strength found in community, empowering users to both seek and provide hope through shared stories and encouraging messages, all within a compassionate environment.
